title: Enhancing Instructional Practice Competencies: Whole-Learning Theory-Based STEM Education Instructional Design Capability Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Through learning needs analysis, systematic diagnosis of problems in STEM education settings is possible.
Innovative instructional design ideas can be generated through intrinsic reflection and external collaboration.
The STEM instructional design process can be optimized with differentiated strategies considering gender characteristics.
In a project-based learning environment, learners can directly construct and evaluate STEM education design models.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
